annotations.description: Nobody knows who created this classic, but it has persisted and for very good reason: it's goddamned delicious. Another great thing about this drink is that ...
annotations.title: The Mysterious Classic Lucien Gaudin

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
.5oz (15ml) Campari
.5oz (15ml) Cointreau
.5oz (15ml) Dry Vermouth
Twist Orange

Stir and strain into coupe
Garnish with orange twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ocn_ZLQXC6M&
title: Lucien Gaudin
